sentences.sContent: Spelling mistakes are often just the result of haste.
sentences.sContent_eng: Spelling mistakes are often just the result of haste.
sentences.sCn: 拼写错误经常是由于匆忙而造成的。

sentences.sContent: And if haste is the accelerator pedal, multitasking is overdrive.
sentences.sContent_eng: And if haste is the accelerator pedal, multitasking is overdrive.
sentences.sCn: 如果匆忙是加速器的踏板，一心多用就是超速档。

sentences.sContent: My workmate gestured, clarifying his intentions of using a forged(faked) passport in haste.
sentences.sContent_eng: My workmate gestured, clarifying his intentions of using a forged(faked) passport in haste.
sentences.sCn: 我的同事打着手势，匆忙地解释着他使用假护照的意图。

words.tran: 轻率的；匆忙的；草率的；性怠的

trans.tranOther: great speed in doing something, especially because you do not have enough time
